function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy consumption due to affluent lifestyle","Impact":"Increased strain on energy resources and potential environmental impact","Mitigation":"Promote energy conservation and efficiency measures","Technologies":"Smart metering, energy-efficient appliances, and renewable energy systems","People":"Kuwaiti residents","Owner":"Ministry of Electricity and Water (MEW)"},{"Description":"Lack of energy conservation awareness","Impact":"Continued high energy consumption and strain on resources","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns and incentives for energy conservation","Technologies":"Media advertising, public awareness campaigns, and incentive programs","People":"Kuwaiti residents","Owner":"Ministry of Electricity and Water (MEW)"},{"Description":"High government subsidy leading to low energy cost","Impact":"Less incentive for energy conservation and increased consumption","Mitigation":"Gradual reduction of subsidies and implementation of tiered pricing","Technologies":"Policy changes, smart metering, and regulatory measures","People":"Kuwaiti residents, government","Owner":"Government of Kuwait"}]}
